input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Silver Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our silver 8mm stainless steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for any occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='GLD Miami Cuban Chain Bundle'
  - Name='The GLD Shop Miami Cuban Link Bracelet 8mm'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 24" Gold Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Black Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Iced Out Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Silver Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Youth Cuban Link'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Link Silver Bracelet'
  - Name='JAXXON 26" Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON Tennis Chain Silver 20'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Link Pearl Necklace, 20"'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Silver Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Chain Stack'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a Cuban chain bundle likely including chains similar in style and function, but the 'bundle' nature and lack of specifics on size or metal lower exact relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The GLD Shop Miami Cuban Link Bracelet 8mm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: The product is an 8mm Cuban link item, similar in gauge and style, but it is a bracelet not a chain, slightly reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Bracelet
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Cuban link style bracelet but larger 10mm size and gold with iced out feature, plus it is a bracelet not a chain.
Same brand and Cuban link style bracelet, but no size or metal specified; still a bracelet, which is smaller and different format compared to chain.
Same brand, Cuban link chain, similar product type. Gold instead of silver and 24 inch length noted, but similar construction and function.
Same brand and 8mm gauge, Cuban link style likely, but 'black set' possibly indicating color or coating different from silver chain; still similar in construction.
Same brand, 8mm gauge, Cuban link; however, iced out style adds embellishment differing from plain silver chain.
Very close: same brand, 8mm gauge Cuban link with silver material, likely very similar product or set including the chain.
Same brand and 8mm gauge Cuban link, but noted as 'youth' indicating possible size or length difference; similar style nonetheless.
Same brand, Cuban link silver material, but bracelet format not a chain, so function and size differ.
Same brand, Cuban link chain, slightly longer 26" length but very similar in construction, design, and use.
While same brand and silver chain, the 'tennis chain' style is a different silhouette and link construction from Cuban link, lowering relevance.
Same brand and 8mm Cuban link necklace but with pearl elements, adding different embellishment that changes style from plain silver chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Silver Chain Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, Cuban link silver chain, but smaller 5mm gauge and iced out embellishment. Different size reduces exact match relevancy.
Same brand and silver Cuban link style, but larger 10mm gauge, likely different weight and look; still quite relevant.
Same brand and Cuban chain concept, but 'stack' implies multiple chains layered, which differs from a single chain product.
Same brand, silver Cuban link chain but smaller 5mm gauge; different thickness but similar construction.
Same brand, Cuban link chain but gold and 10mm gauge instead of silver 8mm; similar product type but different in key materials and size.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand Cuban link gold chain set but with iced out embellishment and 10mm size; different finish and decoration decreases relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand, Cuban link gold chain but smaller 5mm and iced out style; differs from plain silver 8mm chain.
